required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on April 13, 2016
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Drug-drug Interaction of Empagliflozin (BI 10773) and Simvastatin
clinical_study.official_title: Relative Bioavailability of BI 10773 and Simvastatin After Single and Combined Administration - an Open-label, Randomised, Crossover Trial in Healthy Subjects

oversight_info.authority: Germany: Federal Institute for Drugs and Medical Devices
United States: Food and Drug Administration

brief_summary.textblock: The objective of the study is to investigate the drug-drug interaction potential between BI 10773 and simvastatin.

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Randomized, Endpoint Classification: Safety Study, Intervention Model: Crossover Assignment, Masking: Open Label, Primary Purpose: Treatment

primary_outcome.measure: Empa: Area Under the Curve 0 to Infinity (AUC0-∞)
primary_outcome.description: Area under the concentration-time curve of empagliflozin (empa) in plasma over the time interval from 0 extrapolated to infinity. The geometric mean (gMean) and geometric coefficient of variation (gCV) are adjusted values.

primary_outcome.measure: Simvastatin: Area Under the Curve 0 to Infinity (AUC0-∞)
primary_outcome.description: Area under the concentration-time curve of the analyte in plasma over the time interval from 0 extrapolated to infinity. Simvastatin acid is an active metabolite of simvastatin. The geometric mean (gMean) and geometric coefficient of variation (gCV) are adjusted values.
Maximum measured concentration of the analyte in plasma, per period. The geometric mean and geometric coefficient of variation (gCV) are adjusted values
Maximum measured concentration of the analyte in plasma, per period. The geometric mean and geometric coefficient of variation (gCV) are adjusted values.

secondary_outcome.measure: Empa: Area Under the Curve 0 to the Last Quantifiable Data Point (AUC0-tz)
secondary_outcome.description: Area under the concentration-time curve of the analyte in plasma over the time interval from 0 to the time of the last quantifiable data point. The geometric mean and geometric coefficient of variation (gCV) are adjusted values.

secondary_outcome.measure: Simvastatin: Area Under the Curve 0 to the Last Quantifiable Data Point (AUC0-tz)
secondary_outcome.description: Area under the concentration-time curve of the analyte in plasma over the time interval from 0 to the time of the last quantifiable data point. The geometric mean and geometric coefficient of variation (gCV) are adjusted values.

arm_group.description: 1 tablet BI 10773, oral administration with 240 ml water
1 tablet simvastatin, oral administration with 240 ml water
1 tablet BI 10773 + 1 tablet simvastatin, oral administration with 240 ml water

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion criteria:
- healthy male and female subjects
Exclusion criteria:
- Any relevant deviation from healthy conditions

participant_flow.pre_assignment_details: This was a randomised, open label, 3 period crossover study. Treatment periods were separated by a washout period of at least 7 days.

group.title: Empa Alone / Simvastatin Alone / Empa Plus Sim
group.description: Patients were administered three treatments in the following order: A single dose of empagliflozin 25mg A single dose of simvastatin 40mg A single dose of empagliflozin 25mg together with 40mg simvastatin

group.title: Empa Alone / Empa Plus Sim / Simvastatin Alone
group.description: Patients were administered three treatments in the following order: A single dose of empagliflozin 25mg A single dose of empagliflozin 25mg together with 40mg simvastatin A single dose of simvastatin 40mg

group.title: Simvastatin Alone / Empa Alone / Empa Plus Sim
group.description: Patients were administered three treatments in the following order: A single dose of simvastatin 40mg A single dose of empagliflozin 25mg A single dose of empagliflozin 25mg together with 40mg simvastatin

group.title: Simvastatin Alone / Empa Plus Sim / Empa Alone
group.description: Patients were administered three treatments in the following order: A single dose of simvastatin 40mg A single dose of empagliflozin 25mg together with 40mg simvastatin A single dose of empagliflozin 25mg

group.title: Empa Plus Sim / Empa Alone / Simvastatin Alone
group.description: Patients were administered three treatments in the following order: A single dose of empagliflozin 25mg together with 40mg simvastatin A single dose of empagliflozin 25mg A single dose of simvastatin 40mg

group.title: Empa Plus Sim / Simvastatin Alone / Empa Alone
group.description: Patients were administered three treatments in the following order: A single dose of empagliflozin 25mg together with 40mg simvastatin A single dose of simvastatin 40mg A single dose of empagliflozin 25mg

baseline.population: Treated Set: All subjects who took at least 1 dose of investigational treatment.

group.title: Study Overall
group.description: This was a randomised, 3-period, crossover trial. The trial was open label. The three treatments were separated by a washout period of at least 7 days.

outcome.title: Empa: Area Under the Curve 0 to Infinity (AUC0-∞)
outcome.description: Area under the concentration-time curve of empagliflozin (empa) in plasma over the time interval from 0 extrapolated to infinity. The geometric mean (gMean) and geometric coefficient of variation (gCV) are adjusted values.
outcome.population: Pharmacokinetic (PK) set: PK set included all evaluable subjects who took at least one dose of investigational treatment and provided at least one observation for at least one primary PK endpoint without important protocol violations relevant to the evaluation of PK.

group.title: Empa Alone
group.description: 25mg empagliflozin (empa) alone

group.title: Empa Plus Sim
group.description: 25 mg empagliflozin (empa) together with 40 mg simvastatin (sim)

measure.title: Empa: Area Under the Curve 0 to Infinity (AUC0-∞)
measure.description: Area under the concentration-time curve of empagliflozin (empa) in plasma over the time interval from 0 extrapolated to infinity. The geometric mean (gMean) and geometric coefficient of variation (gCV) are adjusted values.

analysis.groups_desc: Considered characteristic is empa plus simvastatin divided by empa alone
analysis.non_inferiority_desc: No formal testing, investigation of relative bioavailability
analysis.estimate_desc: Standard deviation is actually the geometric coefficient of variation (gCV)

outcome.title: Simvastatin: Area Under the Curve 0 to Infinity (AUC0-∞)
outcome.description: Area under the concentration-time curve of the analyte in plasma over the time interval from 0 extrapolated to infinity. Simvastatin acid is an active metabolite of simvastatin. The geometric mean (gMean) and geometric coefficient of variation (gCV) are adjusted values.
outcome.population: Pharmacokinetic (PK) set: PK set included all evaluable subjects who took at least one dose of investigational treatment and provided at least one observation for at least one primary PK endpoint without important protocol violations relevant to the evaluation of PK.

group.title: Simvastatin Alone
group.description: 40 mg simvastatin alone

group.title: Empa Plus Sim
group.description: 25 mg empagliflozin (empa) together with 40 mg simvastatin (sim)

measure.title: Simvastatin: Area Under the Curve 0 to Infinity (AUC0-∞)
measure.description: Area under the concentration-time curve of the analyte in plasma over the time interval from 0 extrapolated to infinity. Simvastatin acid is an active metabolite of simvastatin. The geometric mean (gMean) and geometric coefficient of variation (gCV) are adjusted values.

analysis.groups_desc: AUC of simvastatin Considered characteristic is empa plus simvastatin divided by simvastatin alone
analysis.non_inferiority_desc: No formal testing, investigation of relative bioavailability
analysis.estimate_desc: Standard deviation is actually the gCV

analysis.groups_desc: AUC of simvastatin acid Considered characteristic is empa plus simvastatin divided by simvastatin alone.
analysis.non_inferiority_desc: No formal testing, investigation of relative bioavailability
analysis.estimate_desc: Standard deviation is actually the gCV

outcome.title: Empa: Maximum Measured Concentration (Cmax)
outcome.description: Maximum measured concentration of the analyte in plasma, per period. The geometric mean and geometric coefficient of variation (gCV) are adjusted values
outcome.population: Pharmacokinetic (PK) set: PK set included all evaluable subjects who took at least one dose of investigational treatment and provided at least one observation for at least one primary PK endpoint without important protocol violations relevant to the evaluation of PK.

measure.description: Maximum measured concentration of the analyte in plasma, per period. The geometric mean and geometric coefficient of variation (gCV) are adjusted values.

analysis.groups_desc: Cmax of simvastatin. Considered characteristic is empa plus simvastatin divided by simvastatin alone.
analysis.non_inferiority_desc: No formal testing, investigation of relative bioavailability

reported_events.time_frame: First administration of trial medication until next administration of trial medication or up to post-study visit, up to 36 days

certain_agreements.pi_employee: All Principal Investigators ARE employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: There is NOT an agreement between Principal Investigators and the Sponsor (or its agents) that restricts the PI's rights to discuss or publish trial results after the trial is completed.
